Comment: As a Californian, I give Newsom points for doing what he said he would do: reduce the gap between rich and poor. Many of his policies have done just that through certain tax breaks and social programs whether people realize it or not. Mega points to him for batting away the NIMBYs preventing more housing to be built. Super mega points to him for continuing to fund free breakfast and lunch for K-12 despite a budget deficit. I do wish he would hold some folks accountable for this rail project though... I don't care what Newsom does after he terms out in 2026 as long as it involves continuing to make MAGAs lose their shit and give him free airtime in their minds.
